item.title: Azure Cloud Root Keys (Insecure Storage) - Responsible Disclosure
item.description: Back inÂ February I found an Android application which is used by the emergency services, that had exposed Azure API keys within the application leading to potential compromise of sensitive incident reports, attachments, and infrastructure server “.vhd” files with the access level to spin up new instances or delete them. I immediately reported this to the application developer and it’s respective organisation under responsible disclosure, which resulted in an instant and prompt response, which I give huge kudos for.
